casebody.data:
BRANCH BANKING & TRUST COMPANY, Appellant,
v.
TURNING LEAF-LAKELAND PROPERTIES, LLC, a Florida limited liability company; Imperial Lakes Land Corp., a New York Corporation; Gary L. Gregory, individually, and William G. Giarusso, individually, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-790 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed February 2, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
